description: In prison, the inmates have no power. Behind bars the wardens have all control. The prisoners are at their mercy…and every now and again the guard likes to take advantage of their situation. Petal is helpless in her cell, she does not know if she will be scrubbed clean, made to cum or just left to struggle in tight bondage…she does not know that today she will receive all of this and more.
title: Adrianna Nicole
